sentence: driving this increase was the increase in subscription revenue across our offerings which grew to $2.66 billion in fiscal 2020 from $2.28 billion in fiscal 2019, representing 17% year-over-year growth.

driving this increase was the increase in subscription revenue across our offerings which grew to $2.66 billion in fiscal 2020 from $2.28 billion in fiscal 2019, representing 17% year-over-year growth.
total digital media arr grew to $10.18 billion at the end of fiscal 2020, up from $8.33 billion at the end of fiscal 2019
creative arr exiting fiscal 2020 was $8.72 billion, up from $7.25 billion at the end of fiscal 2019
document cloud arr exiting fiscal 2020 was $1.46 billion, up from $1.08 billion at the end of fiscal 2019

revaluing our ending arr for fiscal 2020 using currency rates at the beginning of fiscal 2021, our digital media arr at the end of fiscal 2020 would be $10.26 billion or approximately $77 million higher than the arr reported above.

revenue from digital experience increased $330 million during fiscal 2020, as compared to fiscal 2019 primarily due to subscription revenue growth across our offerings of which the largest contributors were our aem and marketo engage offerings.
